Reviews.Title: “For low budget - excellent when visiting by car”
Reviews.Author: ionutvasilescu
Reviews.Content: shouldnt expect quality food rich buffet hotel exact standards campanile network ibis etap prices confortable clean tha bathrooms nice unlike bathrooms ibis hotels example refurbished redesigned furniture flat screen tv etc breakfast modest 6070 enight barcelona shouldnt expect novotel standards prices value money excellent accommodation suitable people own car personal rented highway easy reach visiting barcelona drive closest subway station park drive heart city parking fees stayed wife 3 nights car convenient stay easy reach low price easy reach city stayed campanile hotels paris cannes time choice strongly recommend hotel people looking spend money hotels confortable stay car

Reviews.Title: “Good, if you're traveling by car”
Reviews.Author: RomanSad
Reviews.Content: hotel located city center close highway car forget public transportation city car thats exploring sights catalonia town barcelona hotel clean service nice staff restaurant
